subject: Issue with recently received order
description_text:
Hello I recently ordered a set of Simsonn Pedal Pro X Ultra with Haptics and RGB Feedback from your website and paid for the option to come with haptics. Today only received the pedals and no haptics. I was wondering if there was some sort of mix up or if they had been shipped separately.
Sent from my iPhone[image0.jpeg]

conversations.body_text: Hi isaac tovar,  Please provide the order number starting with SSN, and I’ll help you check it. Usually, our orders are shipped in two separate packages.
